questions.question: Which sensor is used to measure the distance to an object in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: PIR sensors are used for motion detection, not for measuring distances.
explanations.b: DHT sensors measure temperature and humidity, not distance.
explanations.c: Ultrasonic sensors are used to measure the distance to an object by emitting sound waves.
explanations.d: Soil Moisture sensors measure the moisture level in the soil, not distance.

questions.question: Which sensor is used for detecting motion in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: MQ135 is used for air quality detection, not for motion detection.
explanations.b: PIR sensors are specifically designed to detect motion by sensing infrared radiation.
explanations.c: Soil Moisture sensors detect soil moisture levels, not motion.
explanations.d: Ultrasonic sensors are used for measuring distances, not for detecting motion.
